modal.debug_tool_clear_modal_body: Clearing local data will log you out and any unsaved data will be lost!
modal.debug_tool_introduction: Help us to improve Gentics CMS. This tool is for analysis purposes in case something unexpected happens in the Gentics CMS user interface.
modal.debug_tool_privacy_details:
The report contains information about the current state of the application, some of which is stored locally in your browser, and information about the browser & operating system used.
We do not intentionally collect your name, email, or any other form of personally identifiable information. However, the debug report may contain customer-specific information, which will not be used and will be treated confidentially.
debug_tool_usage_steps: Create a report when a problem occurs. The report will be saved as a file on your device.
Clear local data of the application on your browser. After logging in again, please check if the problem persists.
Submit the report to support@gentics.com with a description of the problem.
